summaries.short: Mike was born in Nigeria, has lived in France and England. He prefers the countryside to the city. He has a large family and enjoys being around them He has several hobbies and enjoys art. He wants to go to University.
summaries.medium: Mile was born in Nigeria and has lived in France and England. He prefers the countryside of France to the cities of England. He as a large family and enjoys being with them. He has several hobbies including cooking, photography and sports. He wants to attend University and study art.
summaries.long: Mike was born in Nigeria and has does not remember his time there but has movies from his childhood to remind him.He has also lived in France and England. He prefers the countryside of France to England. He enjoys being outside and away from cramped spaces. He has not traveled outside Europe very often. He has a large family and enjoys spending time with them. They are fluent in French. He has several hobbies including, football, cooking and art. He wants to go to University to study art, photography or fashion. He wants a steady job and paycheck. He enjoys being with people.
